${modID}:PotionID.NAME: Some Kind of Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Exactly how depends on the potion, and you can set it up however you want.

${modID}:HallucinationPotion.NAME: Hallucination Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yDazzling . At the end of your turn, lose #b%d #yDazzling .

${modID}:MatchaParfait.NAME: Matcha Parfait
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b%d #yMelody to your hand that deals random damage between #b6 and #b30.

${modID}:FreshlySqueezedCucumber.NAME: Freshly Squeezed Cucumber
DESCRIPTIONS: At the begining of your next turn, gain #b%d #Block.
